Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board.GameBoard
public class GameBoard extends Object
GameBoard Class, main classes, here there are all board elements.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard(int playersNumber, boolean isExp)
      GameBoard Constructor, this constructor initializes all the elements in the board.
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - The number of players.
      isExp - This parameter is set true whether the game is in expert mode.

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard(Map<HouseColor,Integer> statusBag, Map<Player,Assistant> statusPlayedAssistants, List<Island> statusIslands, List<Cloud> statusClouds, List<SpecialCharacter> statusCharacters, Map<HouseColor,Player> statusProfessors, boolean isExp, int idMotherNatureIsland)
      GameBoard Constructor, this constructor initializes all the elements in the board to the last saved status.
      Parameters:
      statusBag - A map that contains the number of students in the bag.
      statusPlayedAssistants - A map that contains the played assistants from the saved status.
      statusIslands - A list that contains the islands from the saved status.
      statusClouds - A list that contains the clouds from the saved status.
      statusCharacters - A list that contains the special characters from the saved status.
      statusProfessors - A map that contains the player that posses each professor.
      isExp - This parameter is set true whether the saved game is in expert mode.
      idMotherNatureIsland - The id of the island where mother nature is in the saved status.

  • Method Details

    • initializeCharacters

      private void initializeCharacters()
      Initializes the special characters.

    • getBag

      public Bag getBag()
      This method exposes the rep of the bag with the students.
      Returns:
      The Bag of students that hasn't been already played.

    • getClouds

      public List<Cloud> getClouds()
      This method returns a copy of clouds.
      Returns:
      The data structure that contains all the clouds.

    • getMotherNatureIsland

      public Island getMotherNatureIsland()
      This method return the island where mother nature is placed.
      Returns:
      The island where mother nature is on.

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(Island targetIsland, Assistant playedAssistant) throws IllegalMoveException
      This method moves mother nature from her current position to targetIsland whether is permitted.
      Parameters:
      targetIsland - The island where the player would like to move mother nature.
      playedAssistant - The played assistant that shows the max movement that mother nature can do.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - Player would like moves MotherNature over assistant card limit.

    • getIgnoreColor

      public HouseColor getIgnoreColor()
      This method returns the color that will be ignored in the evaluations of influence.
      Returns:
      The ignored color.

    • setIgnoreColor

      public void setIgnoreColor(HouseColor ignoredColor)
      This method set the color that will be ignored in the evaluations of influence.
      Parameters:
      ignoredColor - The color that will be ignored.

    • removeEffects

      public void removeEffects()
      This method resets all the effects on the board.

    • getIslands

      public List<Island> getIslands()
      This method returns a copy of islands.
      Returns:
      The data structure that contains all the islands.

    • getIslandById

      public Island getIslandById(int idIsland) throws IslandNotFoundException
      This method returns the island searching with his id.
      Parameters:
      idIsland - The island's id.
      Returns:
      The searching island.
      Throws:
      IslandNotFoundException - The exception is throws whether the island that you are searching.

    • getInfluence

      public Map<Player,Integer> getInfluence(Island targetIsland)
      This method returns a HashMap of the player with influence on the target island.
      Parameters:
      targetIsland - The island where influence is evaluated.
      Returns:
      The HashMap where the first is the player and the second the influence on the island.

    • getInfluenceByTowers

      private void getInfluenceByTowers(Map<Player,Integer> partialResult, Island targetIsland)
      Gets the influence points given by towers' contribution.
      Parameters:
      partialResult - The current influence.
      targetIsland - The island on which the influence is being calculated.

    • setTowerOnIsland

      public void setTowerOnIsland(Island island, TowerType tower)
      This method is used to set a tower of a certain type on the island given; it calls the merge() method if needed.
      Parameters:
      island - The island on which the tower is going to be put.
      tower - The TowerType of the tower to put.

    • merge

      private void merge(Island leftIsland, Island rightIsland)
      This method merges two islands on the left, increasing the size and the students on the resulting island.
      Parameters:
      leftIsland - The island hosting the merge.
      rightIsland - The island merging with the island on it's left.

    • getCharacters

      Returns:
      The data structure three characters.

      This method returns a copy of the professors.
      Returns:
      The data structure the professors.

    • setProfessor

      public void setProfessor(HouseColor color, Player player)
      The method give access to the data structure professors: the first is the HouseColor, the second is the Player who has the professor.
      Parameters:
      color - The house color of the professor.
      player - The player who takes the professor.

    • addPlayedAssistant

      public void addPlayedAssistant(Player currentPlayer, Assistant playedAssistant) throws IllegalMoveException
      This method adds assistants to the data structure in the class GameBoard.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The current player that would like to play the card.
      playedAssistant - The card that the player would like to play.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - The played card is already played from another player.

    • flushAssistantsList

      public void flushAssistantsList()
      This method cleans the references to all the assistants played in the round.

      player - The player who plays the card.
      Returns:
      The card played by the player.
